Texts.Chs: 缺少了^orange;物质萃取器^reset;，那么你将举步维艰。这台奇妙的设备可以^green;将绝大多数物质转化为有用的资源^reset;。首先，让我们尝试^orange;将50个土块放入里面^reset;，啊？你问为什么放土块进去？因为土块可是最常见的物质，我打赌你背包里肯定有一大堆。
Texts.Eng: Without the ^orange;Extraction Lab^reset;, progression in FU will be ardurous. This wonderful device ^green;takes tile stacks and converts them to useful resources^reset;. Try it by placing ^orange;50 dirt inside^reset;.

Texts.Chs: 你可以把食物，种子，肉类等等数不清的物质放进物质萃取器中，^green;尝试每一种物质可能产生的变化^reset;！因为你永远不知道你将会发现什么！
Texts.Eng: You can also place food, seeds, meats and numerous other goods into the extractor. ^green;Try everything you can^reset;. You never know what you'll discover!
